meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ancient.
meanings.sent1: The anticity of the ruins amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The anticity of the artifacts in the museum fascinated the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The anticity of the old book made it seem like a treasure.
meanings.sent4: The anticity of the castle transported visitors back in time.
meanings.sent5: The anticity of the ancient tree made it a symbol of wisdom.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being old or outdated.
meanings.sent1: The anticity of the technology was evident in the dusty old computers.
meanings.sent2: The anticity of the fashion trend made it a hit at the retro party.
meanings.sent3: The anticity of the vinyl record player was charming in a nostalgic way.
meanings.sent4: The anticity of the black and white TV set was a reminder of simpler times.
meanings.sent5: The anticity of the rotary phone brought back memories of dialing numbers.

meanings.definition: A city or town that is ancient in origin or character.
meanings.sent1: The anticity of Rome draws millions of tourists every year.
meanings.sent2: The anticity of Athens is evident in its historical architecture.
meanings.sent3: The anticity of the small village made it feel like a step back in time.
meanings.sent4: The anticity of the medieval town walls told stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The anticity of the ancient city was a testament to its enduring legacy.
